Text: O̩jo̩ e-amo̩jo̩, ki che Jihofa fʼo̩la ka me̩,
Zayo̩n, kʼi chʼalifia ki mufu kpa,
O̩jo̩-wa awa, i la achechi n,
I ado̩ efojale ate̩
kakini, Kʼabo ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼumi jeju wʼugbo mi,
Efojale efojale adʼo̩kpakpa-wñ kpogo,
Neti, O amone̩-mi, tak u nako̩la,
Nadʼo̩la bi we̩ tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ kʼe̩ kpa n;
Nagbʼo̩ko̩ okuno̩ kwef unyi-we̩ n,
Todu e̩wñ iñmi efoko okoke du omi ne̩,
U chema ame̩we̩ oj uwo oj uwo chaka,
Ebi ma chaka kpa mi, u ma ka ñw e̩ n;
Omi aje̩ e̩la amagbiti?
Me̩ ki nʼugwa chʼiche̩bo̩ ñw O̩jo̩,
e̩ ki la kwado̩ mi o̩jo̩ o̩pe̩cha;
I muda chʼe-e̩ne̩bibi O̩jo̩ kakini:
Abu kʼo̩la ekʼuwe̩ chʼe̩wñ ulaka-we̩,
E̩ fʼajoji li, e̩ yo̩ ñw u;
Uwe̩ tʼalu-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩bie̩ne̩,
Uwe̩ gugu achʼakpabie̩ o̩maye-we̩;
Uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ le̩ che me̩ oñ u chechi;
Me̩ fʼibe-i kpe̩ ta, ame̩ ku me̩ gbenyo̩ O̩jo̩ le̩,
E̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼugwa wa achʼiche̩bo̩ mak ojima i adu ñw mi le̩;
